src_original: nāgabhūṣitasarvāṅgaṃ bṛhatkukṣiṃ bhayānakam /  daṇḍaṃ khaḍgaṃ tathā cakraṃ savyahasteṣu dhārayan // Pik_185 //
hṛddeśe tarjanīpāśaṃ padmaṃ paraśuṃ ca vāmataḥ /  ḍākinyādibhayadhvaṃsī pratyālīḍhapadena saḥ // Pik_186 //
ākāśaśyāmakaṃ ghoramakṣobhyakṛtaśekharam /  kṛṣṇaraktasitāsyaṃ ca tryakṣaṃ lambodaraṃ vibhum // Pik_188 //
